synopsis:
This follow-up to the classic 1980s "Voltron" animated series features a new class of recruits joining forces with the original team to form legendary super robot Voltron in an effort to fight evil. Set several years after the original series, "Voltron Force" follows three new recruits -- Daniel, Vince and Larmina -- who get a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to train alongside their heroes and learn to fly incredible robot lions. Bonds are formed and friendships tested as the team gets together in an epic battle of good versus evil.

(Wikipedia)
